entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
